div.p: Online Courses
Content Hours Viewed
Average Rating
Choose a course based on your stock market interests.
Stock Market Basics
Understand stock market concepts, key terms, and essential strategies.
Technical Analysis
Learn to spot trading opportunities with technical analysis
Option Trading
Learn to trade in options and diversify your portfolio
Trading Strategies
Master proven strategies to enhance your trades
Stock Market in Hindi
A trading strategy is the method of buying and selling in markets
Crypto
Learn how to analyze, trade, and invest in crypto
Stock Market Investing
Understand the fundamentals of investing and build a diverse portfolio
NISM
NEW
Gain the knowledge to confidently clear NISM certification exams.
Clear your doubts with a personal guidance call
Book a face to face call with India’s top experts.

div.p: 1 Lakh+ traders and investors are learning with Upsurge.
I bought a course on option trading by Jyoti Budhia jisme maine Option Trading ke regarding basic concept se advanced strategy tak sikha jisse mujhe meri apni trading mein help mili.
Priyam Sharma
Enrolled in: Options Trading for Beginners
I enrolled in the Options Scalping course by Siva, and it has helped me become much more confident in the stock market. The course is explained well and I could understand the concepts thoroughly.
Hardik Bombatkar
Enrolled in: Options Scalping Strategy

The course was very interesting and I could understand the concepts really well. I understood swing trading and scalping differences and how to apply the right indicators. I recommend it for all!! 👏👍👍
Anirudha Basak
Enrolled in: Swing Trading and Scalping Strategies

I had first taken a basic course on technical analysis on upsurge.club aur jis tarah se concept samjhaye gaye the usse mera trading experience strategy building aur bhi strong hogaya. It helped me understand the market better.
Trisha Agarwal
Enrolled in: Technical Analysis in Hindi
I bought a course from upsurge.club which was on price action cpr. This course was conducted by Gomathi Shankar and it has helped me clear all my concepts..and improve my trading! 🙂
Vaishali Parmar
Enrolled in: Price Action Strategy using CPR

I started my journey in options trading course by Aseem Singhal on Upsurge.club. This helped my trading journey become a lot easier and smoother and helped me better understand the concept of option trading.
Meeral Patel
Enrolled in: Introduction to Options Trading

I recently bought Upsurge.club PRO and it has been one of the best decisions of my life. Its is very good to understand everything from basic to advanced courses in one package.. recommend it to all! Bahut achha hai sirji 👍
Divyesh Chauhan
Enrolled in: Upsurge.club PRO

I was able to study multiple strategies under the guidance of industry experts like, Gomathi Shankar, Jyoti Budhia, Mukta Dhamankar, Khagesh Agarwal and many more. It's been a great journey so far and I've begun to understand option trading better and I'm making better trading decisions.
Paras Pathak
Enrolled in: Learn Technical Analysis in Hindi

For me, upsurge.club has proven to be a great resource when it comes to learning about options trading. The courses are well structured and the practical examples help grasp difficult concepts about trading options.
Harshita Saggar
Enrolled in: Options Trading for Beginners
Follow us

a.li: Complete Course on Indian Stock Market
How to Pick Best Mutual Funds?
How to Pick Stocks for Long Term

Intraday Strategy for Bank Nifty Futures

div.p: We're building Upsurge.club - to empower you with the knowledge and skills you need to trade and invest in the stock market.
Stock Markets are the true indicator of the growth of any country's economy. We are bullish on India, we are bullish on India's prospects to be one of largest economies of the world.

We believe that stock markets provide a unique opportunity for all Indians to participate in the growth story of India. With Upsurge.club, we are making the same possible for Indians. As financial services are becoming more accessible, a large set of Indians today seek to become financially aware and literate. They want to tap into the potential of the stock market, one of the best asset classes known for its returns. We help in doing exactly that through our wide range of courses created for both beginners stepping into the stock market and experienced traders and investors looking to enhance their skills. With Upsurge.club, everyone can access the knowledge that will allow them to make wise trading and investment decisions, leading the way to financial success.
built with love
for Indians who love to trade & invest

a.span: we are a part of Raise Financial Services
